page.title: 10BROOK FARM 3
page.content: {CROPS.} BARLEY TWO AND THREE QUARTER TONS OF BARLEY CAN BE HARVESTED IN A GOOD YEAR BUT IN A BAD YEAR IT MAY GO DOWN TO TWO AND A QUARTER TONS.IN A GOOD YEAR THE BARLEY IS SENT BREWERY BUT IN A BAD YEAR IT IS USED AS FODDER FOR THE ANIMALS. WHEAT THE FARMER GROWS TWO TYPES OF WHEAT: {AVALON}FOR BREADMAKING { GALAHAD} FOR FODDER WHEAT IS BOUGHT FOR Â£100 PER TON. SUGAR BEET THE SUGAR BEET IS SENT TO IPSWICH TO THE SUGAR MANUFACTURERS WHO EXTRACT THE SUGAR FROM THE ROOTS.THE FARMER THEN BUYS BACK THE PULP FOR FODDER AND THE TOPS FOR SHEEP FEED.
